In California, we made it easier for young people to get involved in voting — even before they turn 18. Now 16- and 17-year-olds can pre-register to vote and they’ll be automatically registered on their 18th birthday. Share to spread the word: http://registertovote.ca.gov.

Last night’s elections prove just how important every single phone call and every single door knocked is. Some elections will come down to the wire in November. Every connection made between now and then matters — we can’t sit on the sidelines.
